original_text: While Jehoram was king, Edom's people turned against Judah. They would no longer accept the king of Judah's authority over them. They decided to have their own king.
korean_text: 여호람 때에 에돔이 배반하여 유다의 지배하에서 벗어나 자기 위에 왕을 세우므로

sentences.original_text: They would no longer accept the king of Judah's authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 유다 왕의 권위를 받아들이지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They decided to have their own king
